group_1.textLeft: WE'RE HEEEEERE!! TOKIMEEEE!!

group_1.textRight: The village is as wonderful as ever.@It's so natural! It feels nice, and…

group_1.textLeft: The air is so fresh, isn't it?

group_1.textRight: Plus there aren't any people around!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I feel like I can live here without worries!

group_1.textRight: Oh my! Welcome back, everyone!

group_1.textLeft: We're home!

group_1.textRight: Um… Is this a new friend from the city?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, my name is Ryouko Natsu!

group_1.textRight: Natsu… @[chara:801000:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:801000:cheek_0][chara:801000:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:801000:lipSynch_1]Ah, from Jouan Temple!

group_1.textLeft: Yep!

group_1.textRight: Then this is your first time coming to Tokime Village,@I take it?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah!

group_1.textRight: I see!
There isn't much going on around here,@so please feel free to take it easy.

group_1.textLeft: I'll take your word for it!

group_1.textRight: Hey, hey! Where do you wanna go first?
There are so many places I want to show you!
The view from the bridge is unlike anything outside@of our village.

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah, it's great!@Okay, then let's…
Excuse me! We're not here to play.
Hey, Mother?
Is it alright if we take her "there"?

group_1.textRight: "There"?@[chara:801000:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:801000:cheek_0][chara:801000:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:801000:lipSynch_1]Oh, that…

group_1.textLeft: This is…
the shrine where Kyubey is worshipped…

group_1.textRight: Yep…
This is where the great Kyūbē granted our wishes@to save the Land of the Rising Sun
and we became Diviners.

group_1.textLeft: We are far from the only ones…
All of the Magical Girls of the Tokime clan's history@made their wishes here,
for the sake of the Land of the Rising Sun.@And then they spread across the country…

group_1.textCenter: (Saving the Land of the Rising Sun, eh…?)
(Y'know, I wonder if Kyubey's in the back@somewhere.)
(It'd be wrong to poke around without permission.)
(I got better manners than to do somethin' like that.)
Ooh, the heck? That's one old-lookin' book!

group_1.textRight: Ah— hands to yourself!

group_1.textLeft: What's with all the people's names in this?@…Some kinda list?
Hey, Shizuka and Chiharu's names are in here too!

group_1.textRight: What? Really?
I've never heard of such a thing…@What is this list for?
Ah, that is…
A list of the names of every girl who has offered@her life for the Land of the Rising Sun.

group_1.textLeft: Hang on…@D-does that mean…?

group_1.textRight: So basically, we're heroes?

group_1.textLeft: Heroes, huh…
(A hero…)

group_1.textRight: My, that's a nice way to put it.
The people who gave their lives as part of their@mission to protect the Land of the Rising Sun…
Those heroes...
This shrine is dedicated to them, as well.

group_1.textLeft: (Hero…)

group_1.narration: "Your mother was a hero, you know."

group_1.textLeft: (A hero who gave…her life!!)
DAMN IT!

group_1.textRight: Wh-what's wrong, Ryouko-chan…?

group_1.narration: "Your mother was a hero, you know."@"She saved Japan."@"She risked her own life to protect it."@"Her self-sacrificing spirit was truly wonderful."
My mom was a hero too…apparently.
Some big guy came and told me that after she died.
But I've never once felt proud about it.

group_1.textCenter: (I…I had to go through…@so many hardships…)
(I wonder, these Tokime Magical Girls…@Are they the same…?)
(Are they really proud of somethin' like that…?)
(I don't… How…? Why?@They can't be, right…?)
